org.fest.swing.fixture
Class ComponentFixture<T extends Component>

java.lang.Object
  org.fest.swing.fixture.ComponentFixture<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of Component that this fixture can manage.
Direct Known Subclasses:
JButtonFixture, JComboBoxFixture, JFileChooserFixture, JLabelFixture, JListFixture, JMenuItemContainerFixture, JMenuItemFixture, JOptionPaneFixture, JSliderFixture, JSpinnerFixture, JSplitPaneFixture, JTabbedPaneFixture, JTableFixture, JTextComponentFixture, JToggleButtonFixture, JTreeFixture
public abstract class ComponentFixture<T extends Component>
extends Object

Understands simulation of user events on a Component and verification of the state of such Component.

Author:
Alex Ruiz, Yvonne Wang

          Performs simulation of user events on target

robot - performs simulation of user events on a Component.

Throws:
ComponentLookupException - if a matching component could not be found.

Method Detail

targetCastedTo

public final <C extends T> C targetCastedTo(Class<C> type)
Returns the Component managed by this fixture casted to the given subtype.

Type Parameters:
C - enforces that the given type is a subsubtype of the managed Component.
Parameters:
type - the type that the managed Component will be casted to.
Returns:
the Component managed by this fixture casted to the given subtype.
Throws:
AssertionError - if the Component managed by this fixture is not an instance of the given type.

showPopupMenu

public final JPopupMenuFixture showPopupMenu()
Shows a popup menu using the Component managed by this fixture as the invoker of the popup menu.

Returns:
a fixture that manages the displayed popup menu.
Throws:
ComponentLookupException - if a popup menu cannot be found.
